DOC.detailed_description: The investigator examine effect exercise cardiovascular fitness cognitive process . Specifically , investigator examine exercise improve brain function brain area know entorhinal cortex . Together hippocampus brain area important memory formation spatial navigation . Participation research study take approximately 4 month . During time , participant make three initial study visit . The first visit inform consent screening , second visit baseline fitness testing , third visit cognitive test functional MRI exam . Functional MRI brain imaging technique use magnetic field `` take picture '' brain person performs cognitive task . It take approximately three week complete initial three study visit . Following three initial study visit , exercise-training program begin . Participants randomize one two training program : cardiovascular endurance-training program ( aerobic exercise ) strength , balance , flexibility training program ( non-aerobic exercise ) . The exercise training program last 12 week . There three one-hour exercise session per week . After completion exercise-training program , participant attend two follow-up study visit . The first follow-up visit fitness test . The second follow-up visit cognitive test MRI exam .
